trans-unit.source: Specifies the display name for a property, event, or public void method which takes no arguments.
The default is the name of the property or event.

The default implementation of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A> uses reflection to search the public properties and public void methods that take no arguments.
trans-unit.target: 기본 구현은 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A> 리플렉션을 사용 하 여 공용 속성 및 public void 메서드 인수를 가져오지 않고를 검색할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A> searches for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DisplayNameAttribute> on each property and method and, if found, uses that string instead of the property or method name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A> 검색의 <xref:System.ComponentModel.DisplayNameAttribute> 각 속성에 대해 및 메서드 고, 있는 경우, 사용 하 여 속성 또는 메서드 이름 대신 해당 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DisplayNameAttribute> class to change the name of a property called `MisnamedProperty` to `RenamedProperty` in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제를 사용 하 여 보여 줍니다.는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.DisplayNameAttribute> 라는 속성의 이름을 변경 하려면 클래스 `MisnamedProperty` 를 `RenamedProperty` 에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For a full code listing, see [How to: Apply Attributes in Windows Forms Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-apply-attributes-in-windows-forms-controls.md).
trans-unit.target: 전체 코드 목록을 참조 하십시오. [하는 방법: Windows Forms 컨트롤에서 특성 적용](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-apply-attributes-in-windows-forms-controls.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DisplayNameAttribute" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DisplayNameAttribute" /> class.
The display name.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DisplayNameAttribute" /> class using the display name.
Specifies the default value for the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DisplayNameAttribute" />.
This field is read-only.
Gets the display name for a property, event, or public void method that takes no arguments stored in this attribute.
The display name.
Gets or sets the display name.
The display name.
The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DisplayNameAttribute" /> to test the value equality of.
Determines whether two <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DisplayNameAttribute" /> instances are equal.
<see langword="true" /> if the value of the given object is equal to that of the current object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Returns the hash code for this instance.
A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DisplayNameAttribute" />.
Determines if this attribute is the default.
<see langword="true" /> if the attribute is the default value for this attribute class; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
